chunk:
Nourish London CERAMIDE MOISTURE BOOST ESSENCE

Brand: Nourish London

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Aqua (water), Glycerin, Glyceryl caprylate, Trehalose, Sodium hyaluronate, Glycosphingolipids, Cucumis sativus (cucumber) fruit extract, Salix nigra (willow) bark extract, Vaccinium myrtillus (bilberry) fruit/leaf extract, Vanilla planif

ract, Vanilla planifolia fruit extract, Olea europaea (olive) fruit extract, Styrax benzoin resin oil, Saccharomyces/copper ferment, Saccharomyces/iron ferment, Saccharomyces/magnesium ferment, Saccharomyces/silicon ferment, Saccharomyces/zinc ferment, Brassica oleracea acephala (kale) leaf extract, Leuconostoc/radish root ferment filtrate, Levulin

nt filtrate, Levulinic acid, Sodium levulinate, Caprylic/capric triglyceride, Propanediol, Sorbitan oleate, Xanthan gum, Algin, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Panthenol, Citric Acid.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
